title: Incorrect log message with Jacoco extension and custom location
body:
### Describe the bug

When setting the Jacoco report location using `quarkus.jacoco.report-location`, the setting does indeed output the report at the provided location.

During the build it outputs the following messages, which seems incorrect considering the correct behavior.

> Unrecognized configuration key "quarkus.jacoco.report-location" was provided; it will be ignored; verify that the dependency extension for this configuration is set or that you did not make a typo

**Note** that we are using a YAML configuration.

### Expected behavior

No unnecessary log messages is created.

### Actual behavior

Unnecessary log messages is created.

### How to Reproduce?

1. Add `quarkus-jacoco` to project
2. Set the `quarkus.jacoco.report-location`
3. Observe invalid message and correct behavior


### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

macOS 12.6

### Output of `java -version`

OpenJDK 17.0.1

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

Quarkus 2.13.0.Final

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

Gradle 7.5.1

### Additional information

_No response_
